snippet: DIMENSTEIN--Charles, passed away on March 3, 2016. Charlie was the devoted and beloved husband of Sheila Dimenstein. Father of David and Deborah, Les and Joanne. Grandfather of Jacob, Libby, Rachel and Caleb. Brother to Eva Horowitz. He was a caring, generous and gentle man. Service Sunday, 11:15 at "The Riverside", 76th and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
lead_paragraph: DIMENSTEIN--Charles, passed away on March 3, 2016. Charlie was the devoted and beloved husband of Sheila Dimenstein. Father of David and Deborah, Les and Joanne. Grandfather of Jacob, Libby, Rachel and Caleb. Brother to Eva Horowitz. He was a caring, generous and gentle man. Service Sunday, 11:15 at "The Riverside", 76th and Amsterdam Avenue. 1/3
